title: Cheap laptop deal: the XPS 13 gets a massive $300 price cut at Dell
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Dell's powerful XPS 13 laptop gets a massive $300 discount
article: Upgrade your machine with this epic laptop deal that we've spotted at Dell. For a limited time, you can get the best-selling XPS 13 on sale for $749.99 (was $1,049.99) when code LTXPSLTS1 is applied at checkout. That's a massive $300 discount and the best price we've found for the powerful laptop.

The Dell XPS 13 laptop features a 13.3-inch InfinityEdge non-touch display and packs 8GB of RAM, 256GB SSD, and a 10th Generation Intel Core i7-10510U processor. The 2019 laptop received an upgraded battery life of up to 19 hours, and the new 2.25mm webcam is now placed above the display. Perfect for students and travel, the lightweight XPS 13 is Dell's smallest 13-inch laptop and weighs just 2.7 pounds. This is one of the best deals we've seen for the XPS 13 and a fantastic price for a powerful laptop with plenty of storage. This deal is a limited-time offer, so we recommend taking advantage of this epic laptop deal now before it's too late.
